items.sentence: I\'m not ever going to wear these shoes again.
The way Tom suggested we do that is dangerous.
The white ball weighs as much as the red ball.
I am tired of hearing the same thing so often.
I asked Tom if I could talk to him in private.
I asked for a seat in the non-smoking section.
I asked her to make four copies of the letter.
Tom broke Mary\'s expensive Chinese Ming vase.
Tom wanted the job, but they didn\'t hire him.
Tom wanted to go home early, but Mary didn\'t.
